com.flyingspaniel.net.weather

Class TimeLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flyingspaniel.net.weather.TimeLayout

  • public class TimeLayout
extends Object
    Represents a single TimeLayout from the NOAA weather REST API
    Since:
    Copyright(c) 2013 Morgan Conrad
    Author:
    Morgan Conrad
    See Also:
    This software is released under the LGPL

    , National Digital Forecast Database (NDFD) REST Web Service

    An example of the XML for a single TimeLayout follows: 

       
      k-p24h-n7-1
      2012-08-20T08:00:00-07:00
      2012-08-20T20:00:00-07:00  (optional)
      ... more starts and ends
